description:
Play Audio, Music and Sound files in your Bubble application.

Actions:
Play / Pause
Mute / Unmute
Volume
Change Playback Rate
Skip forward / backward
Stop
Change track


Please read the documentation (in the plugin), the Bubble Editor and the example at the Service URL:

Editor, documentation, step-by-step and example:
https://bubble.io/page?type=page&name=audio-player&id=bubble-essential-plugins&tab=tabs-1

Demo page:
https://bubble-essential-plugins.bubbleapps.io/version-test/audio-player?debug_mode=true
